testcase.classname: verify the accepted criteria for the given REST API.
testcase.name: GET Reponse body values to be asserted
testcase.system-out: When User submit the GET request as per the data in Json/property file "Carbon credits".passed And User should validate success status code "200".........................passed And User should validate response for boolean value "true"..................passed Then User should validate response body list values for "Gallery" ,"2x larger image in desktop site search results".passed
